unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather really plays spoilsport, no? My grandfather in Punjab always said, "Good monsoon, good crop!". Remember the drought of '87? Total disaster. Even with new tech at IARI, Delhi, yields are still touch and go. Last year, harvest was delayed till 10/10/2023 because of rains. Now expecting something better on 15/07/2024. Fingers crossed for a bountiful Diwali around 20/10/2024. Jai Kisan! R. Prasad's research helped though.
